Detailed Description

Date:
2009-06-06
Author:
Jean-Lou Dupont

Overview

Class

This class serves to hold either a 'receive' side packet or a 'transmit' side packet. For reason of efficiency & speed, each process direction is handled differently.

Pkt instances can be recycled by using the 'clean'

Class

This class uses instances of Pkt class for receiving/transmitting data packets from/to Erlang. Pkt instances are loaned to PktHandler: it is the responsibility of the client to manage them.
